items.content_html: Exploring the power of PEFT by systematically comparing three approaches for nine-class dairy cow behavior classification: training from scratch (ResNet-18, ViT-Small), frozen feature extraction, and parameter-efficient fine-tuning (PEFT) of the DINOv3 foundation model (6.7 billion parameters)
items.title: Sonam525/PEFT-Fine-tuning-cows: Exploring the power of PEFT by systematically comparing three approaches for nine-class dairy cow behavior classification: training from scratch (ResNet-18, ViT-Small), frozen feature extraction, and parameter-efficient fine-tuning (PEFT) of the DINOv3 foundation model (6.7 billion parameters)

items.content_html: A deep learning pipeline for MotoGP team detection, tracking, and re-identification from race broadcast footage. This system combines YOLOv8 for robust object detection with DINOv3 (Vision Transformer) embeddings for semantic team classification.
